thread.title: Railroads warn of nationwide meltdown if extension not granted for safety requirements
thread.title_full: Railroads warn of nationwide meltdown if extension not granted for safety requirements - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Railroads warn of nationwide meltdown if extension not granted for safety requirements
text: Companies tell Congress they need more time to install mandated safety equipment. But many politicians are annoyed that the railroads have failed to meet a federal deadline first imposed eight years ago. ...
